Attacks.Name: Tackle
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Slow special condition.

Attacks.Name: Water Gun
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, push the target character Short if it is Size 3 or less.

Attacks.Name: Bubble
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Stagger special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Shell Defense
Superpowers.Effect: This character adds 2 dice to its defense rolls against Physical and Energy attacks.

Superpowers.Name: Withdraw
Superpowers.Effect: This character gains the Impenetrable Defense special condition until the beginning of its next turn.

Attacks.Name: Hydro Pump
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character may advance Short.

Superpowers.Name: Rapid Spin
Superpowers.Effect: Remove all Stun, Bleed, and Root special conditions from this character. Then, it may make a move action.
